issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
On iOS a custom view to rightView or leftView of an annotation doesn't handle any click,
looks like a bug introduced in the last version (2.3.1) of Ti.Map module (updates with sdk 4.1.0).
using the previous version (2.2.2) works correctly
fields.summary: IOS - Ti.Map v. 2.3.1 doesn't handle click on leftview and rightview
fields.environment:
OS: OSX 10.10.2 
Appc -v 4.1.0 
Sdk 4.0.0 or 4.1.0 
Ti.Map 2.3.1 (previous version tested and works correctly)
